thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Advanced Energy Announces First Quarter 2018 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Advanced Energy Announces First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Advanced Energy Industries Inc :
* ADVANCED ENERGY ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.34 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.16 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 SALES $195.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $187.9 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.32 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $1.30 - $1.40
* SEES Q2 2018 GAAP EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $1.23 - $1.33
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUES $193 MILLION - $207 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.33, REVENUE VIEW $190.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
